condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased national capacity to contribute significantly to the Polio Eradication Initiative

description.narrative: Nigeria has gone 16 months without recording a WPV case. UNICEF supported the GoN in implementing eight rounds of campaigns, which included outbreak response and synchronization with other Lake Chad countries, reaching over 80 per cent in more than 90 per cent of the districts. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: Proportion of scheduled Polio campaigns with appropriate vaccine type & quantity delivered to national Govt. at least one week before implementation
Children under 5 years missing polio vaccination due to refusal (Target:<1%)
